REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Abductee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Accursed child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born at the peak of a lunar eclipse. The elders declared [PAWN_objective] a child of darkness brought [PAWN_objective] under their care. [PAWN_possessive] entire childhood was spent studying the lore and rituals of [PAWN_possessive] people - until the day of calling.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith's child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. [PAWN_nameDef] would help [PAWN_possessive] father whenever [PAWN_pronoun] could. Later, [PAWN_possessive] father took [PAWN_objective] as a blacksmith's apprentice. [PAWN_nameDef] also took on shooting as a hobby.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Brutal thief
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in a gang, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the brutality of the streets. Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, [PAWN_pronoun] closed [PAWN_objective]self of to others.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on the planet New China, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_nameDef] had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep [PAWN_possessive] room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. [PAWN_pronoun] came to abhor violence.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chess master
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to play chess. [PAWN_pronoun] even earned the nickname Bishop for some of [PAWN_possessive] craftier moves. [PAWN_pronoun] never got into trouble - mostly because [PAWN_pronoun] was good at not getting caught.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child of drifters
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ever since [PAWN_pronoun] was very small, [PAWN_nameDef] had never known a home beyond [PAWN_possessive] parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. [PAWN_possessive] life was often perilous but never dull, and [PAWN_pronoun] inherited [PAWN_possessive] parents' wanderlust at a young age.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After graduating college at age twelve, [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] life to becoming immortal. However [PAWN_possessive] research crossed the line when [PAWN_pronoun] tried to modify [PAWN_possessive] body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. [PAWN_pronoun] was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: War may never change - but the cast of characters does. Born on a violent urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Clone-farmed
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called "Disposable."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was bred to become an executive officer for the large space trading corporation that owned [PAWN_possessive] home planet. [PAWN_possessive] family had been working for that corporation for seven generations. At age six, [PAWN_pronoun] started to study at the corporate academy, where [PAWN_pronoun] learned to become a loyal follower and a ruthless executive.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp-bred student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned [PAWN_possessive] home planet. [PAWN_possessive] family had been working for that corporation for four generations. At age five, [PAWN_pronoun] enrolled at the corporate academy where [PAWN_pronoun] learned loyalty and ruthlessness. [PAWN_nameDef] excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreaded baby
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, [PAWN_pronoun] invented the nuclear device that powered [PAWN_possessive] ship. Apparently, [PAWN_pronoun] also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have spawned a race of tasty golden kittens.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since [PAWN_possessive] father was often away, [PAWN_nameDef] took on much responsibility around the house. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the value of hard work, but never really had a childhood. Every day, [PAWN_nameDef] dreamed of leaving [PAWN_possessive] home and exploring new worlds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Dreamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. [PAWN_pronoun] sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female. [PAWN_pronoun] hated fighting, but when made angry, [PAWN_pronoun] could be dangerous. [PAWN_possessive] temper was quick.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Drug mule
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in an orphanage, [PAWN_nameDef] turned towards the gang life at age ten. [PAWN_pronoun] was exploited by the local gang as a drug mule to traffic "substance F" across rival gang territory. [PAWN_pronoun] took a bullet or two.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Energetic pop idol
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. [PAWN_pronoun] spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol. However, [PAWN_pronoun] decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying [PAWN_possessive] enough attention, so [PAWN_pronoun] left.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fallen prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a glitterworld falling into chaos. [PAWN_possessive] father was killed in action. [PAWN_pronoun] struggled for a scholarship at Utmaior Academy and had to prove [PAWN_possessive] right to be there. A child genius, [PAWN_pronoun] was bullied as a charity case and couldn't make friends with the other kids.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm hand
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a farm on a smaller colony world. Everything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including [PAWN_nameDef]. This helped [PAWN_objective] build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feral child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld. One day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. [PAWN_pronoun] then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feudal lordling
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the child of a high lord, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed many privileges. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Galactic page
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served the high admiral of a space fleet. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft. In [PAWN_possessive] feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Game fanatic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games. Once, while attempting to prove [PAWN_possessive] skills in the real world, [PAWN_pronoun] was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped, but the experience stayed with [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gang member
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up without parents. [PAWN_possessive] whole life was spent alone, fighting for survival on the streets. No matter how hard it became to survive, [PAWN_pronoun] never gave up.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved technology from the day [PAWN_pronoun] was born. [PAWN_pronoun] had a mechanoid companion which [PAWN_pronoun] tried to modify when [PAWN_pronoun] was 10. [PAWN_possessive] obsession with technology meant that [PAWN_pronoun] never appreciated arts or culture.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: G-nome sculptor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was engineered in a lab as part of the G-nome Project. [PAWN_pronoun] was implanted at birth with encyclopedic knowledge of all aspects of xenobiology. The G-nome scientists nicknamed [PAWN_objective] Gizmo and occupied [PAWN_objective] with sculpting. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a love of sculpting gnomes and gnome accessories.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hacker prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised as the only child of wealthy surgeons. After being pressured into accepting a medical apprenticeship, [PAWN_pronoun] snapped. [PAWN_pronoun] seized [PAWN_possessive] inheritance and went underground to learn how to exploit computer networks. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly became one of the most feared hackers on [PAWN_possessive] home planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: High baroness
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family. [PAWN_pronoun] was placed In charge of running [PAWN_possessive] home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Indworld urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the streets of a world in the early stages of its industrial revolution. [PAWN_pronoun] passed [PAWN_possessive] days stealing, begging and tinkering with discarded machine scraps, always on the lookout for a way to escape poverty.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Joywire addict
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s wealthy parents provided everything [PAWN_pronoun] ever wanted. After discovering joywires, [PAWN_pronoun] became obsessed. Once [PAWN_possessive] parents realized what happened, they cut [PAWN_objective] off. Uncaring and often violent, [PAWN_pronoun] sought [PAWN_possessive] next joywire fix by any means possible.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Killer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought [PAWN_objective] the product of a snake demon and human coupling. After watching how [PAWN_possessive] human father betrayed and murdered [PAWN_possessive] mother, [PAWN_pronoun] longed to see how many more humans [PAWN_pronoun] could get to fall into [PAWN_possessive] hands.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Labor camp orphan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least [PAWN_pronoun] was clothed and fed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld geek
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a quiet suburban neighborhood. [PAWN_pronoun] was never a master of social interaction, but [PAWN_possessive] interest in computers blossomed into a true talent at an early age.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld sketcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a loving but poor family. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered [PAWN_pronoun] had an artistic talent which [PAWN_pronoun] inherited from [PAWN_possessive] father. [PAWN_possessive] mother taught [PAWN_objective] the benefits of hard work and determination. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew older, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a fascination with technology and military history.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Militant child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s military family forced [PAWN_objective] to train in hand-to-hand combat and fighting tactics. In [PAWN_possessive] own time, [PAWN_pronoun] built small inventions. This sharpened [PAWN_possessive] mind.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military recruit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship. From a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to be a good soldier. They taught [PAWN_objective] how to use a gun and how to fight with melee weapons.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was curious about everything. While other kids played tag in the suburbs of their industrial city, [PAWN_nameDef] read every book [PAWN_pronoun] could find about technology, robots, and weapons - whatever looked coolest. [PAWN_possessive] strong French accent kept [PAWN_objective] from making real friends.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Officer cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] trained to be a leader of men. [PAWN_pronoun] enrolled in the Vanu Defense College when [PAWN_pronoun] was still young, and became proficient with a range of weapons and survival techniques.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Left alone in the world without parents, [PAWN_nameDef] did the best [PAWN_pronoun] could to adapt. Having to take care both of [PAWN_objective]self and younger kids at the orphanage, [PAWN_pronoun] learned a lot about humans and how to interact with them.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pickpocket
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Orphaned and abandoned on the tumultuous streets of [PAWN_possessive] polluted, teeming homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] survived by deft hand and fleet foot. A natural born thief and trickster, [PAWN_pronoun] rose to prominence early, running the notorious and violent urchin gang "Doomben Rats."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pit gladiator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was enslaved as a child and forced to fight creatures and other people in an underground fighting arena. [PAWN_pronoun] showed an affinity for the sport, and eventually bought [PAWN_possessive] own freedom. However, [PAWN_possessive] time in the pits never brought [PAWN_objective] much intellectual stimulation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Plague prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was cut short when a mysterious plague hit [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] watched [PAWN_possessive] friends die, and [PAWN_possessive] compassion for humanity died with them. In its place a new thirst for knowledge emerged.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Power-mad scholar
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within [PAWN_nameDef], and came to form [PAWN_possessive] core drive. When not entombed within libraries, [PAWN_pronoun] would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Professional gamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with video games since [PAWN_possessive] hands were big enough to grip a joystick. [PAWN_pronoun] achieved middling finishes in several local tournaments during the 16-bit era. Nobody noticed when [PAWN_pronoun] retired early in [PAWN_possessive] teenage years.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Project subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was picked by government agents for the mysterious "Frame Project." Due to memory blockages, however, [PAWN_pronoun] remembers very little about this project or its true agenda - only that there were few survivors.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pyro assistant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On an industrial world, [PAWN_nameDef] learned early that if [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to eat, [PAWN_pronoun] had to work. So work [PAWN_pronoun] did. Kids fit in places adults can't, and where [PAWN_pronoun] was from, the safety laws were quite flexible. [PAWN_pronoun] was always a bit of a pyromaniac, and was banned from the kitchen after an unfortunate incident.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rebel student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a modest but privileged family who encouraged [PAWN_objective] to play chess and shoot skeet at a young age. As a bored student, [PAWN_pronoun] found joy in challenging [PAWN_possessive] teachers about the contradictions between [PAWN_possessive] planet's official values and their government's policies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Reclusive prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a flourishing glitterworld afforded [PAWN_nameDef] the chance to fully devote [PAWN_objective]self to [PAWN_possessive] studies. Having taken a keen interest in genetic modification and neural augmentation from a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] had little time (or desire) for a regular childhood.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rich kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money - but no friends. [PAWN_pronoun] was always told by [PAWN_possessive] father that "those peasants just want your money." So, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time alone, or fighting other kids.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Science prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was top of [PAWN_possessive] class in chemistry, physics, exobiology, astronomy and opera. An unfortunate lab accident left [PAWN_possessive] with a deathly fear of fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was in a scout troop on a midworld. [PAWN_pronoun] learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shooting coma
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When [PAWN_pronoun] awoke, [PAWN_pronoun] was useless at most tasks - but [PAWN_pronoun] could aim pretty well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease. Found alone and adopted by another band, [PAWN_pronoun] never became close with the other tribe members. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to stay away from [PAWN_possessive] new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space smuggler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents used [PAWN_objective] to help smuggle contraband between a cluster of rim worlds. Aided by [PAWN_possessive] small size, [PAWN_nameDef] became very adept at carrying out [PAWN_possessive] parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Speeder racer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a fern farmer in the towering forests of Khalderia. [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. The seedy underworld of racing also forced [PAWN_objective] to learn to defend [PAWN_objective]self with a quick word or a quicker shot.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Station whelp
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood as a penniless orphan living on a space station. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to scrape by doing filthy jobs and stealing. [PAWN_pronoun] became so violent due to poor treatment by [PAWN_possessive] "betters" that [PAWN_pronoun] was banished from the station, just to be picked up by space pirates.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the streets of a desert planet, [PAWN_nameDef]'s only friend was a dog named Rest. The pair scraped by, finding just enough food to survive. When [PAWN_pronoun] was 13 years old, an interplanetary criminal group took [PAWN_objective] under their wing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After running away from home, [PAWN_nameDef] had to live on the streets. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up fast, and learned early that [PAWN_pronoun] had to figure out how to fool people into connecting with [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight. Most infants died, but [PAWN_nameDef] did not. [PAWN_pronoun] killed [PAWN_possessive] first man at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tech enthusiast
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had all the latest gadgets as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] spent all [PAWN_possessive] time playing games with AIs instead of with other children. [PAWN_pronoun] always felt awkward around new people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tech-head
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Standing on the ship hull with [PAWN_possessive] father in a child-size EVA suit, [PAWN_nameDef] loved space from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like [PAWN_possessive] father, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time taking care of plants in [PAWN_possessive] messy room. [PAWN_possessive] nickname was given for [PAWN_possessive] love of circles.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Toxic child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on an Industrial planet, [PAWN_nameDef] started working in a chemical plant at the age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left [PAWN_objective] physically and mentally scarred. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tragic twin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was drawn to the water from an early age, and spent as much of [PAWN_possessive] time as possible in and around it. [PAWN_possessive] twin became trapped during a dive and did not survive. [PAWN_nameDef] never returned to the water again.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Trainee alchemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a medieval world. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on [PAWN_possessive] planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tribal thunderer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Years ago, [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. [PAWN_nameDef] is such a child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: War child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were drafted into a civil war in [PAWN_possessive] home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, [PAWN_pronoun] became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. [PAWN_possessive] expressive side, however, never developed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: War refugee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A war broke on out [PAWN_nameDef]'s home planet. Gathering what little food and belongings they could, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] father stole a ship and escaped into space.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland wanderer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed [PAWN_possessive] ancestral home. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath [PAWN_possessive] family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, Lucas struck out into the wasteland, alone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Winerunner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned by [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by the monks of the Novo Mosteiro dos Jerónimos monastery on Aracena VI. The monks taught [PAWN_objective] discipline and hard work. In return, [PAWN_pronoun] would go into the city and "acquire" exotic wines for the monks' nightly tastings.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wolf pack member
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was discarded by [PAWN_possessive] family. Raised by wolves, [PAWN_pronoun] ran, hunted, and defended [PAWN_possessive] pack. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Young psychologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of [PAWN_possessive] mother's cab. Watching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, [PAWN_pronoun] soon became very good at figuring out someone's real purpose.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Youth delinquent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only child of celebrity sommeliers. [PAWN_possessive] parents expected [PAWN_objective] to take up the family profession, but after [PAWN_possessive] third admission to a youth detention center, this career path became unlikely. While in detention, [PAWN_nameDef] became skilled at making shanks and developed an interest in orinthology.
